description:
Hibernation is for bears, not your feet. These Bear country socks use merino wool to keep your feet warm and dry. And with their targeted cushioning, you'll feel planted shredding those double blacks.

  • Awesome bear design by Brittney Lewis showing your love of the outdoors
  • 4 Degree™ Elite Fit System combines two so you get a snug fit and precise control while on the slopes
  • Targeted cushioning to provide the best fit and all-day comfort
  • Indestructawool™ blend improves durability in high-wear areas
  • Shred Shield™ technology helps reduce wear at the toes
  • Mesh vent zones provide temperature and moisture management
name: Smartwool Ski Targeted Cushion Bear Country Print OTC Socks - Unisex
